glaze.name: Candace Black
glaze.description: Candace Black from The Complete Guide to High-Fire Glazes, p. 127, also listed on p. 76. 65 F-4 Feldspar, 5 Whiting, 20 Silica, 5 Kaolin, 5 Dolomite, 8 Red Iron Oxide, 5 Cobalt Carbonate. Used instead Carbonate Oxide(P3403), Aluminium Oxide(P3300) as Kaolin, Red Synthetic Iron Oxide(P3441), Flint(P3319) as Silica, Feldspar FFF(P3316) as F-4 Feldspar.

glaze.name: Transparent Green
glaze.description: Transparent Green "base" from The Complete Guide to High-Fire Glazes, p. 98, but using Tin Oxide instead of Zinc Oxide. 70 Cornwall Stone, Whiting 10, Grolleg Kaolin 10, Tin Oxide 10, Copper Carbonate 4. Instead of Grolleg Kaolin(whatever that is) was Aluminium Oxide(P3300) used.

glaze.name: Will's Oribe
glaze.description: Will's Oribe from The Complete Guide to High-Fire Glazes, p. 101. Custer Feldspar 50, Whiting 15, Silica 30, Kaolin 5, Copper Carbonate 5. Used Flint(P3319) as Silica, and Aluminium Oxide(P3300) instead of Kaolin, and Feldspar FFF(P3316) as Custer Feldspar.

glaze.name: ModifiedMamo
glaze.description: Mamo from The Complete Guide to High-Fire Glazes, p. 121. Custer Feldspar 25, F-4 Feldspar 25, Whiting 5, Kaolin 10, Calcined Kaolin 15, Dolomite 20. Due to lacking ingredients it was instead: Feldspar(P3316) 50, Whiting 5, Aluminium Oxide 35, Dolomite 20.

glaze.name: ModifiedMamo
glaze.description: Mamo from The Complete Guide to High-Fire Glazes, p. 121, with Cobolt. Custer Feldspar 25, F-4 Feldspar 25, Whiting 5, Kaolin 10, Calcined Kaolin 15, Dolomite 20. Due to lacking ingredients it was instead: Feldspar(P3316) 50, Whiting 5, Aluminium Oxide 35, Dolomite 20, 2 Cobolt Oxide.
